page.title: 06OFFICE BLOCKS - NEW MALDEN
page.content: In New Malden there are two large office blocks which have come under much criticism lately. One which is next to New Malden station is unused and has been arousing anger because Â£1m has recently been spent on it,but it has done nothing to improve its prospects of being sold or let;the other is being rented. The two tower blocks are opposite each other and because of the open space between them,it is a very windy area causing a large amount of litter to gather and blow up into the air. It also seems wrong that so much money is being spent on something no-one wants,when so many people need to be housed in better places.
